idea-plugin.name: Spring Boot Wizard
idea-plugin.description:
Spring Boot Project Wizard for IntelliJ IDEA Community Edition

Provides a user-friendly interface to create Spring Boot projects with Spring Initializr integration.


Features:

  • Integration with Spring Initializr (start.spring.io)
  • Support for Java, Kotlin, and Groovy
  • Gradle (Groovy/Kotlin) and Maven build systems
  • Easy dependency selection with search
  • Multiple Spring Boot versions
